ProjectTitle: Investigating the role of astrocytes and noradrenaline as critical regulators of neuronal circuit excitability.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/07/2022 2. [REDACTED] please also list your samples/materials, these are considered physical data 4. [REDACTED] for microscopy OME is a widely used standard (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2) and for sequencing MINSEQE (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.a55z32) please take a look if these could be useful for your work. [REDACTED] can also find standards by reading submission guidelines of repositories, the metadata that GEO/arrayexpress use are based on MINSEQE for example 7. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you considered using a repository for data preservation and sharing? [REDACTED] archive (www.ebi.ac.uk/bioimage-archive/) or IDR (https://idr.openmicroscopy.org/) for microscopy; arrayexpress (www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/) or GEO (www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/) for sequencing for example? KU [REDACTED] now also has a repository that you can use: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
